A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a hardcore Star Wars fan\, I find it very sad to see how narrow minded and intellectually lacking Star Wars fans can be. For a series that focuses on self reflection and the internal struggle between light and dark\, you would think more fans would learn to look a little deeper. This movie is absolutely fantastic\, and the most intriguing in the series. Look further than what is right in front of your face and stop whining about childish nostalgia.
